‘‘efsiayidiya danata manthriwarun 29 denakugen prashna kara athi bawath, efsiayidiye ek aramunak wanuye eekabaddha wipakshaye manthrin aanduwata bandawa ganima sandaha biya waddima bawath, eekabaddha wipaksha manthringe ayithiwasikam ha waraprasada ahimi karathiyi da wipaksha nayaka ha wipakshaye pradhana sanwidhayaka path kirimedi owun nosalaka hara athayi da parlimenthuwe pramanawath niyojanayak laba nodena bawada, rate wadagath prashna waladi rajaya prashna karana manthrin halluwata path karamin uththara dena bawath, kadinam pilithuru dimata niyamitha prashna walata masa ganan kal ganna bawath, mema karunu karana nisa shri lankawe prajathanthrawadi agayata ha sampradayata hani siduwana bawa owun paminille sandahan kara atha.
